symc.name: WH_CALLWNDPROC
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that monitors messages before the system sends them to the destination window procedure. For more information, see the CallWndProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_CALLWNDPROCRET
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that monitors messages after they have been processed by the destination window procedure. For more information, see the CallWndRetProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_CBT
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that receives notifications useful to a CBT application. For more information, see the CBTProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_DEBUG
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure useful for debugging other hook procedures. For more information, see the DebugProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_FOREGROUNDIDLE
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that will be called when the application's foreground thread is about to become idle. This hook is useful for performing low priority tasks during idle time. For more information, see the ForegroundIdleProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_GETMESSAGE
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that monitors messages posted to a message queue. For more information, see the GetMsgProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_JOURNALPLAYBACK
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that posts messages previously recorded by a WH_JOURNALRECORD hook procedure. For more information, see the JournalPlaybackProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_JOURNALRECORD
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that records input messages posted to the system message queue. This hook is useful for recording macros. For more information, see the JournalRecordProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_KEYBOARD
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that monitors keystroke messages. For more information, see the KeyboardProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_KEYBOARD_LL
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that monitors low-level keyboard input events. For more information, see the LowLevelKeyboardProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_MOUSE
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that monitors mouse messages. For more information, see the MouseProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_MOUSE_LL
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that monitors low-level mouse input events. For more information, see the LowLevelMouseProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_MSGFILTER
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that monitors messages generated as a result of an input event in a dialog box, message box, menu, or scroll bar. For more information, see the MessageProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_SHELL
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that receives notifications useful to shell applications. For more information, see the ShellProc hook procedure.

symc.name: WH_SYSMSGFILTER
symc.desc: Installs a hook procedure that monitors messages generated as a result of an input event in a dialog box, message box, menu, or scroll bar. The hook procedure monitors these messages for all applications in the same desktop as the calling thread. For more information, see the SysMsgProc hook procedure.
